rows.label: tlk70000029_05_msg0001
rows.name:
In all the years of my life I have never
witnessed such upheaval in Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000029_05_msg0002
rows.name:
I expect the road ahead of you will be
long and hard, and there is little an old
man like me can do to help.

rows.label: tlk70000029_05_msg0003
rows.name:
But at least I can stay here and shout at
everyone to keep their chin up and
carry on. I'm good at that.

rows.label: tlk70000029_05_msg0004
rows.name:
There are people here who believe in
the king and in you. We may not be
warriors but we're not powerless!

rows.label: tlk70000029_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Be careful, my friends. And be sure to
come back to see the gardens one day.
